Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Ebe foto si, Reuters
Onyeisiala ọhụrụ nke mba Amerịka bụ Joe Biden amalitela ọrụ ịtụgharị ụfọdụ iwu Donald Trump mere mgbe ọ nọ n'ọkwa.
Biden mere nke a n'ime elekere ole na ole e duchara ya n'iyi ọrụ n'ụbọchị 20 ọnwa Jenụwarị, 2021.
Lee iwu anọ Donald Trump tinyere nke Joe Biden ga-emegharị n'egbughị oge
Electoral College Certification: Mike Pence na ndị omeiwu Amerịka ha enwere ike ịkụchapụ mmeri Joe Biden?
O binyere aka n'ime iwu ruru iri na asaa (170 ọkachasị n'ihe banyere etu a ga-esi busoo ọrịa covid-19 agha.
Ihe ndị ọzọ metụtara ndị mbịara mbịara, mgbanwe ihu eluigwe, nakwa mmekọ agbụrụ na ibe ya.
Kedụ iwu ndị o binyere aka na ya?
Onye bụ Joe Biden bụ onyeisiala ọhụrụ mba Amerịka
Akwụkwọ ozi si n'obi gọọmentị nke depụtara iwu ndị a kọwara na oge eruola a ga-eji "megharịa ihe ndị ọchịchị Trump mebiri"
Ụfọdụ n'ime ha gụnyere:
- Iwu ikpuchi ihu n'ụlọọrụ gọọmentị etiti niile.
- Ụlọọrụ ọhụrụ ga-elekọta ihe gbasara nkwụsị mfesa coronavirus.
- Ịkwụsị usoro Trump malitere ịpụta n'ọgbakọ World Health Organisation (WHO).
- Isonyekwa na "Paris climate agreement" na-ahụ maka ọdịmma ihu eluigwe.
- Mwepụ ikike e nyere ụlọọrụ Keystone XL Pipeline.
- Mwepụ ego a mapụtara ịrụcha mgbidi kewara mba Amerịka nakwa Mexico.
- Mwepụ mmachi njem e tinyere n'ụfọdụ mba okpukpere alakuba.
Ihe ịkwesịrị ị maka Bill Biden bụ nwunye onyeisiala ọhụrụ Amerịka
Ihe ọzọ pụtara ihe bụ na ya na onyeisiala mbụ ya na ya ga-enwe mkparịtaụka bụ Justin Tredeau nke mba Kanada.
Mkparịtaụka ha nke ga-eme n'ụbọchị Fraide ga-emetụta okwu Keystone XL Pipeline nke agbụrụ ndị Native Amerikans na-eme ngagharịiwe maka ya kemgbe afọ iri.
